data.name: Moke
data.description:
Moke is a virtual reality game where players become Moke (gorilla) taggers in the jungle. With the immersive gameplay, players will feel as though they are in the jungle, tracking and tagging gorillas in real-time. The VR headset and controllers offer an intuitive and realistic experience, allowing players to climb trees, swing from vines, and use stealth to avoid detection from the mokes. 

The game is exciting and engaging, with challenging obstacles and unexpected twists, providing hours of entertainment.  Select your game mode, which includes, Casual, Horror, and Infection Modes.

Moke is a must-have for VR enthusiasts and those looking for a new gaming experience. Whether playing solo or with friends, players will be immersed in the jungle, easily tracking Mokes (gorillas) and navigating the wilderness. The game's immersive graphics and engaging gameplay make it an instant classic, and it's sure to be a hit among VR gaming enthusiasts.

Overall, Moke is a VR tag game like no other. With stunning graphics, immersive gameplay, and challenging obstacles.  Get ready for the ultimate VR gaming experience with Moke!
